channel.title: Bow string interface?
channel.description:
Hi, I was wondering if anyone could help me with creating a Stringing interface, that lets players right click and select "String all" or "string 10" etc... I am new to interfaces... But I always like to learn :P Plus lot of my players have suggested to add this into the server which I also agree it should be there...
I am using a 317 DELTA source. Thanks ahead of time.
-Killerswan
